TopicTitle: Scatterer making atmosphere and oceans white

Articles.Content: Hi, I have downloaded Scatter, stock visual enhancements, kerbal alarm clock, kerbal engineer and docking port alignment indicater mods. I am running the newest version of KSP with both DLC's. When I open the game with scatterer installed, the oceans and atmosphere are a bright white and the contrast is messed up. It seems to be a problem solely with the scatterer mod. Is there anything I can to do solve this? Thanks.
